text: allahuve allate ninnal aradhikkarutâ€Œ; matapitakkalkkum bandhukkalkkum anathakalkkum agatikalkkum nanma ceyyanam; janannaleat nalla vakk parayanam; prart'thana mura prakaram nirvahikkukayum sakatt nalkukayum ceyyanam ennellam nam israyilyareat karar vanniya sandarbham (orkkuka). (ennal israyil santatikale,) pinnit ninnalil kuracc perealike marrellavarum vimukhatayeate pinmarikkalayukayan ceytatâ€Œ
